name: Twin Flames
summary: Twin Flames is a 2D action platformer with roguelike elements to spice it up. You can play as either Joachim or Boaz, a pair of God siblings who must fight for all eternity in order to bring balance and peace to the universe, whether they want to or not. However, you have a time limit to do so, that means that you must be quick and fight your way trough hordes of monsters, lethal traps and a lot of mystical mysteries in order to reach the top of the tower and become the ultimate God of Time.
